headline: Agoda Collaborates with the Philippines Department of Tourism to Enhance Hospitality through Technology
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda has partnered with the Philippines Department of Tourism (DoT) to launch the inaugural edition of its exclusive Executive Masterclass platform, under the theme of 'Leadership for Resilience'. The one-day session was held for 72 participants including DoT senior officials, hotel associations, and hotel partners from across the Philippines, focusing on capacity building and inclusive growth in tourism.
